about_the_game: Our preview is finally out! Please take a first look at the upcoming mystery adventure game Fey: Distant Daydream.
detailed_description: Our preview is finally out! Please take a first look at the upcoming mystery adventure game Fey: Distant Daydream.
name: Fey: Distant Daydream Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 SP1/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.5 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo E6300 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600GT or equivalent with Shader Model 4.0 support
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The native resolution scale will be slightly more taxing on your system than the default Retro Mode.

short_description: An old mansion, a mysterious letter, a box of old memorabilia. Explore the present and past to uncover the secrets of the extraordinary family that lived here. Enjoy a sneak preview to the mystery adventure Fey: Distant Daydream.
